required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sonographic Examination of Renal Function in Individuals With Long-term Spinal Cord Injury
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Sonographic Examination of Renal Function With Gold-standard Examination in Individuals With Long-term Spinal Cord Injury

brief_summary.textblock: Patients with long-term lower urinary tract dysfunction due to spinal cord injury presenting for a routine urodynamic control will be screened for inclusion and exclusion criteria. Suitable individuals providing written informed consent will undergo renal Doppler sonography and renal scintigraphy in addition to the routine examinations. Conclusions regarding renal function based on the clearance rate determined by scintigraphy (gold standard) will be compared with the conclusions based on Doppler sonography and Cystatin C clearance.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
primary_outcome.description: renal clearance of Technetium-99m-dimercaptosuccinic acid determined by scintigraphy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
secondary_outcome.description: blood serum concentration of Cystatin C (mg/L)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
secondary_outcome.description: renal clearance of Cystatin C (ml/min) according to the Grubb formula

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
secondary_outcome.description: Doppler sonography evaluation of renal blood flow during systolic heart phase (m/s)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
secondary_outcome.description: Doppler sonography evaluation of renal blood flow during enddiastolic heart phase (m/s)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study

other_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
other_outcome.description: size of kidneys evaluated by sonography

other_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
other_outcome.description: renal tissue echogenicity evaluated by sonography

other_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study

other_outcome.description: severity of spinal cord injury according to American Spinal Injury Association Impairment Score (AIS) (A = motor and sensory complete, B = motor complete and sensory incomplete, C & D = motor and sensory incomplete, E = motor and sensory intact)

other_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
other_outcome.description: time from spinal cord injury to inclusion into study (years)

other_outcome.time_frame: at the time of inclusion into study
other_outcome.description: time from birth to inclusion into study (years)

intervention.description: Technetium-99m-dimercaptosuccinic acid scintigraphy of both kidneys

study_pop.textblock: individuals with long-term lower urinary tract dysfunction due to spinal cord injury

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- long-term spinal cord injury (≥10 years)
- age ≥30 years
- written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- dementia or severe intellectual impairment
- serious internal illness
- previous or current tumor disease
- known allergy to the radioactive marker (Technetium)
- pregnancy or breastfeeding
- withdrawal of informed consent

patient_data.ipd_description: data will be made available upon reasonable request
